It doesn't, this is inspired in the Unlimited Blade Works route (Rin's), and serves as a NTR point of view of Sakura's actions.
Think of it as an epilogue, as in this story Rin is already in a relationship with Shirou, in Heaven's Feel both Shirou and Sakura end up together.
